Create And Sell Your NFTs

Set Up Your Wallet

Once you have set up your wallet of choice, Connect it to OpenSea by clicking the wallet icon in the top right coener. Learn abour the wallets we support.

Create Your Coollection

Click my collections and set up your collection. Add social link, and description, profile and banner images, and set a secondary sale fee.

Add Your NFTs

Upload your works(images, video, audio or 3D art), add a title and description and customise your NFTs with propertise, stats and unlockeble content.

List Them For Sale

Choose between auction, fixed-price listings and decling-price listings. You choose now how you want to sale your NFTs, and we help you sell them!
